item.title: ChatGPT rockets to 700M weekly users ahead of GPT-5 launch with reasoning superpowers
item.description: ChatGPT reaches 700 million weekly users as OpenAI prepares to launch GPT-5 with integrated reasoning capabilities in August 2025.

item.title: Qwen-Image is a powerful, open source new AI image generator with support for embedded text in English & Chinese
item.description: My initial tests revealed the text and prompt adherence was not noticeably better than Midjourney, the popular proprietary AI image generator

item.title: Why tomorrow’s best devs won’t just code — they’ll curate, coordinate and command AI
item.description: AI coding requires a serious structural change. Where does that leave entry-level developers and the software industry as a whole?

item.title: Why the AI era is forcing a redesign of the entire compute backbone
item.description: Why fulfilling the promise of AI requires a step-change in capabilities far exceeding the advancements of the internet era.

item.title: New vision model from Cohere runs on two GPUs, beats top-tier VLMs on visual tasks
item.description: Cohere's Command A Vision can read graphs and PDFs to make enterprise research richer and analyze the documents businesses actually rely on.
